devicesList.title: It looks like you haven't activated any mobile devices yet.
devicesList.text: Hmm... this blue button seems important...

esnCheck.title: Before you activate your device, let's check if it's valid first
esnCheck.text: In order to do this, all you need is the device's ESN

success.title: Device validation successful
success.text: It is recommended that you check service coverage for the area in which the phone will be primarily used. If you have previously checked coverage and/or are already aware of service availability, you can skip ahead to the Ownership Swap phase.

error.title: Oh no! This device could not be validated

texts.esnInUse: The ESN is already in use.
texts.invalidEsn: Please check the ESN and try again.

deviceActivation.title: Alright, let's activate that device now!
deviceActivation.text: In order to activate your deivce, enter your desired area code. If you do not have a desired area code, please enter the ZIP code in which the phone will primarily be used. You will also need to name your device so you can configure it throughout the system.

labels.linkDevice: Link this device to a user
labels.LinkVoicemailBox: Link a voicemail box to this device

titles.provisioning: Almost finished ... only one more step required for this device.

texts.provisioning: In order to make and receive calls using this newly activated device, it will need to be provisioned on the network. After provisioning this device, it will become available in SmartPBX.Â From there, all you need to do is assign a user and an associated callflow to use this device.

titles.activating: Next, it's highly recommended to check service coverage

checkZipCode.text: To check coverage, enter the ZIP code for the area in which the phone will be primarily used.

titles.selectCategory: Please select the category that your device falls under.

iphone.label: iPhone
instructions: Connect to a Wi-Fi network
Restart phone
Within 2-3 minutes, the phone should start a Hands Free Activation on its own

nexus_5.label: Nexus 5
instructions: Carrier Wipe - Open Dialer, Dial *#*#72786#*#* , Phone will restart and indicate that it is activating
Update Profile - Apps -> Settings -> More -> Mobile networks -> Carrier settings -> Update Profile
Update PRL - Apps -> Settings -> More -> Mobile networks -> Carrier settings -> Update PRL

nexus_other.label: Nexus (Other)
instructions: Carrier Wipe - Open Dialer, Dial *#*#72786#*#*, Enter MSL, Touch OK
System Update - Application->Settings->About Phone->Sprint System Updates
Update Profile - Application->Settings->About Phone->Sprint System Updates->Update Profile
Update PRL - Application->Settings->About Phone->Sprint System Updates->Update PRL

most_samsung_motorola_htc_devices.label: Most Samsung / Motorola / HTC Devices

instructions.label: Carrier Wipe - Open Dialer, Dial ##72786#,  enter MSL (6 digits), then...
instructions: Samsung: Touch OK
Motorola: Touch YES
HTC:  Press "MENU", Select Reset, Phone should powercycle
System Update - Appliction->Settings->System Updates
Profile Update - Application->Settings->System Updates->Update Profile
PRL Update - Application->Settings->System Updates->Update PRL

htc_arrice_most_windows_devices.label: HTC Arrive & Most Windows Devices
instructions: Settings -> Cellular -> Make sure Data Connection is on -> Change Network Profile -> Close -> Change PRL -> Close

feature_unlisted_generic.label: Feature / Unlisted / Generic
instructions: Carrier Wipe - Open Dialer, Dial ##72786#,  enter MSL, Touch OK
System Update - Appliction->Settings->System Updates
Profile Update - Application->Settings->System Updates->Update Profile
PRL Update - Application->Settings->System Updates->Update PRL

texts.default: This may take a few moments.
texts.activatingDevice: This will take up to two minutes... thanks for your patience.

confirmPopup.leavingActivation: You are about to leave the activation process! Are you sure?

deleteDevice.title: Are you sure you want to delete the device:
deleteDevice.text: You can always re-activate a device after deleting it. However, you may permenatly lose the phone number attached to this device, and upon re-activation , be assigned a new number.
